segments.text: Definitely . I Ve got the hell out of the company . Anything new ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , but there is a chance that might be suitable for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? Are you willing to recommend me for the position ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can't say , but let me make a call and see if I can help .
segments.speaker: S1
